citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"a4673314-41e8-47e1-8f70-8943cd2856c2\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Ocean Networks Canada Society\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"05\", \"09\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Ce Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 631772 a \u00e9t\u00e9 d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 le 2022-10-19 au Juan de Fuca Strait. Le Strait of Juan de Fuca est un vaste plan d'eau qui relie la Mer des Salish \u00e0 l'oc\u00e9an Pacifique. Cet instrument est un Capteur d'Oxyg\u00e8ne. Les capteurs d'oxyg\u00e8ne mesurent la concentration d'oxyg\u00e8ne dissous dans l'eau de mer. Il a \u00e9t\u00e9 deploy\u00e9 sur une plateforme fixe. Les donn\u00e9es de ce d\u00e9ploiement sont archiv\u00e9es et accessibles sur l\u2019infrastructure num\u00e9rique Oceans 3.0 du R\u00e9seau Canadien des Oc\u00e9ans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualit\u00e9 et produits d\u00e9riv\u00e9s selon les conventions \u00e9tablies.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Juan de Fuca Strait Capteur d'Oxyg\u00e8ne d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 2022-10-19\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"http://ckan.onc.uvic.ca/dataset/a4673314-41e8-47e1-8f70-8943cd2856c2?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"a4673314-41e8-47e1-8f70-8943cd2856c2\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Ocean Networks Canada Society\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"05\", \"09\"]}], \"abstract\": \"The Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 631772 was deployed on 2022-10-19 at Juan de Fuca Strait. Juan de Fuca Strait is a large body of water that connects the Salish Sea to the Pacific Ocean. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Juan de Fuca Strait Oxygen Sensor Deployed 2022-10-19\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"http://ckan.onc.uvic.ca/dataset/a4673314-41e8-47e1-8f70-8943cd2856c2?local=en\"}]

          <mcc:description>
            <gco:CharacterString>The EPSG Geodetic Parameter Dataset is a structured dataset of Coordinate Reference Systems and Coordinate Transformations, accessible through this online registry (www.epsg-registry.org) or, as downloadable zip files, through IOGP's EPSG home page at www.epsg.org. The geographic coverage of the data is worldwide, but it is stressed that the dataset does not and cannot record all possible geodetic parameters in use around the world.</gco:CharacterString>

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>The Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 631772 was deployed on 2022-10-19 at Juan de Fuca Strait. Juan de Fuca Strait is a large body of water that connects the Salish Sea to the Pacific Ocean. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="fra">Ce Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 631772 a été déployé le 2022-10-19 au Juan de Fuca Strait. Le Strait of Juan de Fuca est un vaste plan d'eau qui relie la Mer des Salish à l'océan Pacifique. Cet instrument est un Capteur d'Oxygène. Les capteurs d'oxygène mesurent la concentration d'oxygène dissous dans l'eau de mer. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme fixe. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>
      <mri:status>
        <mcc:MD_ProgressCode codeList="http://standards.iso.org/iso/19115/resources/Codelist/cat/codelists.xml#MD_ProgressCode" codeListValue="completed"/>
      </mri:status>
      <mri:topicCategory>
        <mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>oceans</mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>
      </mri:topicCategory>

            <gco:CharacterString>An optode dissolved oxygen sensor mounted in plastic (600m operating depth) or titanium (7000m operating depth) housing that interfaces through an RS-232 connection to SeaCAT  or MicroCAT CTDs or Navis Argo float. Accuracy is the greater of 3 micromole/kg or 2%. More information is available at http://www.seabird.com/products/spec_sheets/63data.htm.</gco:CharacterString>
          </mac:description>

name: a4673314-41e8-47e1-8f70-8943cd2856c2
notes: The Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 631772 was deployed on 2022-10-19 at Juan de Fuca Strait. Juan de Fuca Strait is a large body of water that connects the Salish Sea to the Pacific Ocean. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.

notes_translated.en: The Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 631772 was deployed on 2022-10-19 at Juan de Fuca Strait. Juan de Fuca Strait is a large body of water that connects the Salish Sea to the Pacific Ocean. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.
notes_translated.fr: Ce Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 631772 a été déployé le 2022-10-19 au Juan de Fuca Strait. Le Strait of Juan de Fuca est un vaste plan d'eau qui relie la Mer des Salish à l'océan Pacifique. Cet instrument est un Capteur d'Oxygène. Les capteurs d'oxygène mesurent la concentration d'oxygène dissous dans l'eau de mer. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme fixe. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.

description_translated.en: The Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System (CIOOS) Pacific is the regional hub of the National CIOOS for ocean data aggregation on Canada’s west coast.
description_translated.fr: Le Système intégré d’observation des océans canadien (SIOOC) Pacifique est la plaque tournante régionale du SIOOC national pour l’agrégation des données océaniques sur la côte ouest du Canada.

title: Juan de Fuca Strait Oxygen Sensor Deployed 2022-10-19

title_translated.en: Juan de Fuca Strait Oxygen Sensor Deployed 2022-10-19
title_translated.fr: Juan de Fuca Strait Capteur d'Oxygène déployé 2022-10-19
